Ebbro 44607 Nissan Fairlady 240ZG 1972 Fuji Grand Champion Series O. Mitsuhiro

Purchased: 2014
Manufacturer Page: http://www.ebbro.jp/SHOP/44607.html


This is Otsuka Mitsuhiro's Nissan 240ZG from the 1972 Fuji Grand Champion series. Ebbro doesn't indicate which race it represents. From what I found, Mitsuhiro helped developed Yokohama racing tires. I guess that explains the big YOKOHAMA across the nose of the car.
